<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2077</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Changes in perceptions and attitudes of pre-service post-graduate secondary school science teachers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Änderungen in den Vorstellungen und in der 
Haltung Vorservice der fortgeschrittenen Sekundärschulewissenschaft 
Lehrer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changements des perceptions et des attitudes des 
professeurs universitaires supérieurs de la science d'école 
secondaire de pré-service</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudanças nas percepções e nas atitudes de 
professores post-graduate da ciência da escola secundária do 
pre-serviço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamenti nelle percezioni e negli 
atteggiamenti degli insegnanti postlaurea di scienza della scuola 
secondaria di pre-servizio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγές στις αντιλήψεις και τις τοποθετήσεις των 
επαγγελματικών μεταπτυχιακών καθηγητών θετικών επιστημών 
δευτεροβάθμιας εκπαίδευσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambios en opiniones y actitudes de los 
profesores graduados de la ciencia de la escuela secundaria del 
pre-servicio</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The article deals with research into perceptual and attitudinal changes inof postgraduate pre-service high school teachers.The findings of this research are hoped to lead to better pre and in-service training for teachers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">behaviour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pre-teachers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inservice- training.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Artikelabkommen mit Forschung in 
Wahrnehmungs- und attitudinales Änderungen inof fortgeschrittene 
Vorservice High School teachers.The Entdeckungen dieser Forschung 
werden gehofft, um zu führen, um vor zu verbessern und im Dienst 
Training für Lehrer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les affaires d'article avec la recherche sur des 
résultats universitaires supérieurs du lycée teachers.The de 
pré-service d'inof perceptuel et attitudinal de changements de cette 
recherche sont espérées pour mener à améliorer pré et la 
formation sur place pour des professeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os negócios do artigo com pesquisa em findings 
postgraduate da High School teachers.The do pre-serviço do inof 
perceptual e attitudinal das mudanças desta pesquisa são esperados 
conduzir para melhorar pre e o treinamento in-service para 
professores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli affari dell'articolo con ricerca sui 
risultati postlaurea della High School teachers.The di pre-servizio 
del inof percettivo ed attitudinale dei cambiamenti di questa ricerca 
si sperano per condurre per migliorare pre e formazione in loco per 
gli insegnanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το άρθρο εξετάζει την έρευνα στους αντιληπτικούς και 
συμπεριφοριστικούς δασκάλους γυμνασίου αλλαγών inof 
μεταπτυχιακούς επαγγελματικούς Τα συμπεράσματα αυτής της 
έρευνας αναμένονται για να οδηγήσουν καλύτερα προ και συνεχής 
επιμόρφωση για τους δασκάλους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los repartos del artículo con la investigación 
en resultados graduados de la High School secundaria teachers.The del 
pre-servicio del inof perceptivo y attitudinal de los cambios de esta 
investigación se esperan para conducir para mejorar pre y el 
entrenamiento en servicio para los profesores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verhalten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorlehrer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">inservice- Training.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comportement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pré-professeurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">formation d'inservice-.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comportamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pre-professores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">treinamento do inservice-.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comportamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pre-insegnanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">addestramento del inservice-.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συμπεριφορά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προ-δάσκαλοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ενδοϋπηρεσιακός - εκπαιδευτικός.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comportamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pre-profesores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">entrenamiento del inservice-.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
